text.HELP:
You can type "/r25 ..." into slack with a building and room number to get today's events and classes listed into the channel!
Don't want to post the schedule into the channel, but just want the info? Use the /r25 command in a private chat to slackbot. or yourself, or whoever!
Example usage: "/r25 KNE 130"
You may also ask for all breaks, rather than the events/classes, the next break coming up, or for events on another day using "tomorrow" or "+1".
For example: "/r25 KNE 130 breaks"
or: "/r25 KNE 130 next break"
or: "/r25 KNE 130 tomorrow"
Try out commands and see what you can do!
text.ERROR-GENERIC:
Error: incorrect or malformed search string.
Did you search for something like "KNE 130"?
You may also type '/r25 help' for more info.
text.ERROR-ROOM-QUERY: Error: unable to resolve room query. Please make sure the Building Code and Room Number are correct. Type '/r25 help' for additional info.
text.ERROR-EXTENDED-COMMAND: Error: unable to parse extended command arguments. Please check that your command adheres to the supported format(s). Type '/r25 help' for additional info.
